name: Bryce Canyon National Park Utah
info: Bryce Canyon is a giant geological amphitheater on the Paunsaugunt Plateau. The unique area has hundreds of tall sandstone hoodoos formed by erosion. The region was originally settled by Native Americans and later by Mormon pioneers.

name: Canyonlands National Park Utah

name: Capitol Reef National Park Utah
info: The park's Waterpocket Fold is a 100-mile (160 km) monocline that exhibits the earth's diverse geologic layers. Other natural features are monoliths
column8: and cliffs shaped like the United States Capitol
